div.p:
Curia gilde huius burgi tenta per Johannem de marr' prepositum vijmo die mensis februarij
Anno Domini et cetera xlijo
Quo die Johannes bertlotson' primo die vocatus ad intrandum coram preposito non comparuit et cetera
Robertus blyndseil 3o die vocatus ad intrandum Willelmum bird hominem suum et cetera

Gilbert meignes William scherar' thomas blyndseil and John' gray arbitrators
chosin betuex John' voket Williame voket eldar' and gilbert Coly
apon the debate movit betuex thaim because of a certane pak of wald
thai haue ordanit / that how mykil is sald of the said wald / the monee
of it salbe partit evynly ag amangis thaim / and the Remanand of the
wald to be partit Right swa / and at this be done vndir gude faith

Item because that matheu fichet all said it was cum til his vndirstanding
that marioune of Croudane has complengnit to the lord of Erole
that he had al the wite and willfully he put hir' fra hir' wattiris
the quhilkis scho had of before' / quhar'for he askit a declaracion of
the counsaile quhethir' he was cause of the forsaid mater or noght
and than he Removit / and the Counsaile halely decretit that he had
made na sik dec cause na he had na wite thar'of
thir' ar' the names

It is is ordanit be the consall' that ther' men ondirwrytyn' sal be aw
to John' of Fiffis cwnt off his office of aldirmanschip of the yer
In primis John' the wauss' John of scrogis pater thomas blindzeil Andrew
of ayncroft John' gray John' of scrogis the son' John' henrison
culan' and patrik badenach

Memorandum that anens the contribucion to the kingis sistir in bretan' the consall' has
that the officiaris that intromettyt thar with' sal gaddir it and mak fwll'
for all thaim that ar distrenyeabill and all' tha that ar nocht distrenyabill
sall present the persownis to the aldirman and to the comon consall'
alowitt gif it swa be

The xviij day of februar' the yer' of grace et cetera xlij / anence the remanand
of the contribucion to my Elizabeth' of britane the hale counsaile has
ordanit that it be raisit and thar' salbe chosin four' discreite persounes
to falk the tax of men that has tholit skath' eftir as thaim think
speidful / and than the counsaile chesit Simon blabre John' gray
patrikso patrik badenach'

The sammyn day Williame scherar' was oblist to bryng and present his
acompt of the yett be this day xv dayis et cetera to thir' persounes auditouris
chosin John of fife Richard Ruthirfurd' John gray Simon blabre Duncane
of clat Stephyn Johnson' and patrik badenach / he consentit to thir' sammyn
men

It is ordanit be the counsaile and decretit that Androw tulydef remayne
with' the tak that is made him of the pott / And John' bal blak and
adam nycholson' sal be amendit and helpit with' the eraste
vacant that fallis suppose it be bettir than thair' awne et cetera
this was done in the presence of the lord of Drum and all the g counsaile

Item it is ordanyt that Dauid Clerk and th the airis of quhilum thomas
Rolland sal haue the half nett of the furdis that thomas rolland hade
betuex thaim for the termez that it is sett fore

Item it is ordanit because John' of sanchar' clamyt to haue the half
nett of the pott wattir that is sett to John' Kymedy that the forsaid
John' of Sanchar' sal remayne with' the quartar of a nett of the north'
wattir the quhilk is sett him and be content et cetera

Item it is ordanit that William voket eldar' sal be content of the tak
of the half nett of the furdis

Item the aldirman and the balyeis has summytit to the Counsaile vnsuspect
and the debatez betuex thaim to be endit to morne

Item the hall' concell' has condiscendit the xvij of maij
that Robert blindzell' and William Woket ballyes and ressawaris
of the martymes term that thai sall' pay the xxx lib'
to John of mar' aldirman' to wirk the commown' werk
and thar wes than present of the consall' xxij persownis

Presentes in consilio xiijo die mensis Decembris Anno Domini et cetera xliiijto. videlicet
Gilbertus meignes Johannes de fife Ricardus Ruthirfurd' Johannes de Scrogs Johannes
de marr' thomas craufurd' Andreas Ayncroft Duncanus clat Johannes henrison'
culane Willelmus spaigne Simon blabre Stephanus balrony Johannes gray Dauid clerk
Johannes blak Dauid Ruthirfurd' John' scherar' Dunbanane /

It is ordanit and statute for the commoune gude and quiete of this ton' and for
stancheing of trespassours and Rebellouris agayne the law / that al the
induellaris and inhabitantes of this burgh' sal assist to the aldirman and
officiaris of this burgh' to manteigne the law and punyce trespassouris but
fauour' and quhasa dois the contrar' sal be haldin Rebell agayne the ton'
and that the gudemen of the ton' sal write to the king vndir the commoune
Seel / to be punyst be him / and als sic Rebellours salbe excludit fra al
takez profites office and worschip of this ton'

Item quhasa euir beis conuicte thrise for barganyng and tulyheing salbe be haldin
for a commoune tulyhour' and Rebellour' and send to the king as sic trespassour'
and that salbe notifijt vndir the Seel of the ton'

Item that the officiaris of the ton' sal punyce trespassouris eftir the commoune
law and the statutis of this burgh' but favour' / and thai sal heir' na Requeste
of naman for trespassouris quhat degre that euer he be of

Decimosexto die mensis Decembris Anno Domini et cetera xliiijto / Magister Johannes
de clat prebendarius de glenbervi / Resignauit quandam terram quam ex proprio
habuit conquestu in manibus Johannis de Scrogis tunc vnius Jacentem infra
burgum de abirdene in vico castri inter terram ex parte australi eiusdem inter terram
gilbertj de sanchar ex parte orientali ex parte vna / et terram Robertj de camera
ex parte occidentali ex parte altera / in manibus Johannis de Scrogs tunc vnius
balliuorum huius burgi / ad dandum saisinam et possessionem hereditariam
consanguineo suo Duncano de clat burgensi huius burgi / de eadem terra cum pertinenciis
quo facto idem Johannes de scrogs balliuus adhibitis secum diuersis conuicinis
eandem terram adiuit et saisinam et possionem possessionem hereditariam eiusdem eidem Duncano
tradidit et deliberauit per terre et lapidis tradicionem vt moris est et cetera
Testibus Johanne vaus tunc preposito Johanne de scrogs patre Roberto de
camera Willelmo de spaigne Willelmo de cadiou Johanne voket Dauid clerk
Willelmo mathouson' Roberto gillespi Willelmo banerman Jacobo vaus et
alexandro filio Andree seriendo cum multis et diuersis alijs

Item eodem die Resignacione facta per Robertum de camera de terra sua predicta
Jacente ex parte australi vici castri inter terram predictam ex parte orientali v ex
vna et terram quondam Andree branche partibus ex altera / in manibus Duncani de
clat tunc vnius balliuorum huius burgi / idem balliuus saisinam et possessionem
eidem Roberto de camera et Jonete sponse sue Relicte quondam Roberti
gillespy senioris tradidit et deliberauit saluo Jure cuiuslibet / Testibus
supradictis

Decimosexto die mensis supradicti Anno Domini et cetera xliiijto / Anence the fraght' that
Jamez of foulfurd' factour' to the Erle of orkynnay askit at the merchandez of
this ton' / of the gudez that was in his barge that brak at the scaw / It
was ansuerit to the sammyn Jamez / that because it is vnknawin to the said
merchandez / quhether as the cas' is cummyn and gane / thai aw to pay al the
fracht' or part / or noght' / and sen the matir langis thaim / thai arr' lath' to be
Jugis in thair' awne caus' / thai will quhat tyme it be plesand to the said lord
Erle / or at the erast generale counsaile / thai sal compeir' befor the commissaris
of burowis / and than at the ordinance of thaim the fraght' sal be paijt et cetera
alsferr' as thai fynd that it is awand et cetera.

Vicesimotercio die mensis Decembris Anno Domini et cetera xliiijto / Thomas gibson'
burgensis huius burgi Resignauit pure et simpliciter in manibus Johannis de
Scrogs filij vnius balliuorum huius burgi terram suam burgagiam Jacentem infra
eundem burgum in vico furcarum ex parte occidentali eiusdem inter terram quondam Willelmi
de stradee ex parte boreali ex vna / et terram ade de hill ex parte australi
partibus ex altera / ad dandum saisinam et possessionem hereditariam Willelmo Woodman
burgensi eiusdem burgi de eadem terra cum pertinencijs / quam s eidem Willelmo vendidit pro
certa summa pecunie sibi Realiter persoluta et cetera eidem Willelmo et heredibus suis et
assignatis secundum tenorem carte sue perpetuo Remansuram

Secundo die mensis Januarij Anno Domini et cetera xliiijto nicholaius Sarnholt
de ciuitate lubicense presentauit preposito et balliuis quasdam literas testimoniales
aldirmannj et seniorum Juratorum Comunium mercatorum nacionis almanie et cetera
brugis in flandria Residencium quod quidam nauis onusta merchandisa / fratris sui
henrici sarneholt / et sui propri ipsius nicholai alias per pirones et Raptores
in mari hostiliter inuasa fuerat et Rapta ac detenta / et quod ipsa nauis
et merchanse merchandise fuerunt proprie ipsorum henricj et nicholai / et cetera / Et insuper
prefatus nicholaius instetit humiliter preposito et balliuis ac consilio huius
burgi quod ex quo asseritur quod aliqua bona que in dicta naue fuerunt infra
istum burgum alias fuerunt vendita / et dicta nauis periclitata / sibi de Juris
Remedio benigne prouiderent / Qui auisatj / eidem Responderunt / quod ex quo
si quos pro dictis naue et bonis prosequi vel calumpniare voluerit
qui infra libertatem huius burgi reperiri possunt / Justiciam sibi debitam
ministrabunt et cetera

Decimosepto die mensis Januarij Anno Domini et cetera xliiijto thomas branche ex
vna et Robertum Robertus blyndseil / partibus ex altera penes debatam motam inter eosdem super
assedacione piscarie tercie partis Rethis aque de ly mydchingil submiserunt
se certis personis infrascriptis videlicet Johanni de scrogs Andree tulidef Johanni de
marr' et Johanni voket filio / et promiserunt fideliter se stare arbitero et determinaci
determinacioni eorundem / Qui mature avisatj consideratis huicinde alligacionibus
et Racionibus vtriusque partis / laudarunt determinarunt et pronunciarunt quod dictus
Robertus blyndseil habet plenum Jus ex assedacione dicti thome ad piscariam
predictam cum pertinenciis pro termino trium annorum proximo futuro videlicet pro toto cepere quo
predictus thomas eandem habet ex assedacione comitatis / Et dictus Robertus
satisfecit dicto thome pro dicta piscaria pro toto tempore supradicto / solum soluendo
annuatim preposito et balliuis huius burgi firmam tantam / quantam predictus
thomas satisfaceret pro dicta piscaria pro communitatj huius burgi et cetera
Curia gilde tenta in pretorio per prepositum xviij die mensis Januarij Anno supradicto
Andreas

It is statute and ordanit be the commoune counsaile of this burgh' for the commoune
profite of it / that fra hyne forth' wartis in tyme tocum / thar' be na tug nettis
sufferit to fische in ony tyme of the yher' vndir' the payne of eschete of
the net to the aldirman et cetera

Johannes Traile posuit se in voluntate prepositi pro empcione pellium et quia publice tenet
botham cum non sit liber adhuc

p.hi:
Burgenses et Confratres gilde facti tempore prepositure Johannis
vaus de anno Domini M CCCC xliiijto

div.p: Magister Jacobus Stewart decanus morauiensis Receptus fuit pro v' s'
Magister Walterus prendirgest medicus ex consideracione consilij Receptus fuit
Dauid blabre filius Simonis blabre receptus fuit racione paterne libertatis pro v s'
Johannes mathouson' filius Willelmi mathouson' receptus fuit pro v s'
Thomas louson' filius Johannis louson confratris gilde receptus fuit pro v s'

laurencius holles ex gracia consilij concessa domino Willelmo ettale ad Reperacionem
pontis de pulgoveny Receptus fuit libere ab et absque alia quacumque solucione

Thomas Ruthirfurd' ex consideracione' et gracia consilij et ad cedandum discordiam
motam inter eundem thomam et Johannem voket filium receptus fuit pro v s'
Johannes Traile filius Johannis traile confratris gilde Receptus fuit pro v s'
Murthacus glastree ad consideracionem consilij Receptus fuit pro v s' / Andrea culan plegio
Willelmus Stephinson' racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro xl s' Johanne philipson' plegio
Johannes Androuson' Receptus fuit pro iij lib' vj s' viij d' dicto Johanne philipson' plegio
Alexander nichoso nicholson' Receptus fuit pro iij lib' vj s' viij d' / Andrea culane plegio pro omnibus
Willelmus preston' ad Requestam domini Willelmi de forbes militis receptus fuit pro v s'

Jacobus vaus ad requestam et ob fauorem thome et martini vaus filiorum Johannis vaus
Receptus fuit plegio

Thomas filius Johannis Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et
confratrem gilde ad instanciam Johannis gray et deo duce
contrahet matrimoniam cum filia dicti Johannis sub pena x lib'
plegio dicto Johanne gray

Thomas gilrwth receptus fuit in liberam burgensem et confratrem
gilde huius burgi pro v s'
Macbeth alowne Receptus fuit pro iij lib' vj s' viij d' plegio Johanne scherar' Dunbanane

Dauid hervy receptus fuit pro iij lib' vj s' viij d' Inde soluet tantum xl s ij marcas ex consideracione
consilij ob fauorem magistri henrici hervy precentoris ecclesie Abirdonensis
Robertj de camera confratris gilde
Johannes hervy Receptus fuit ex consideracionem consilij pro xx s' quod disponsauit et cetera
Andreas voket filius Johannis voket racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s'

p.hi: Burgenses tantum facti tempore Johannis vaus supradicti

div.p: Johannes baxstar' Receptus fuit pro xxiiij s' prestito solito Juramento et cetera
Gilbertus sclatar' Receptus fuit ex certis causis per graciam consilij preposito solito Juramento
Thomas Willelmj baxstar receptus fuit pro xx s'
Willelmus club baxstar receptus fuit pro xx s'
Matheus sewane receptus fuit pro xx s' plegio Johanne scrogs pro vicinitate eius
Johannes de buchane scissor receptus fuit pro xx s'
Ranaldus Johnson' scissor receptus fuit pro xx s'
Johannes de spens scissor receptus fuit pro xiij s' iiij d'

Antepenultimo die mensis Januarij Anno Domini et cetera xliiijto Comparens dominus adam traile
Capellanus ac tutor legittimus Alexandri traile filij et heredis quondam Andree traile considerata
vtilitate eiusdem pupilli Resignauit in manibus Johannis Scrogs filij tunc vnius balliuorum huius
burgi quandam terram eiusdem Alexandri Jacentem in ly ovirkirkgate ex parte boreali eiusdem
inter terram thome blak ex parte occidentali et terram mariote Relicte eiusdem quondam Andree
ex parte orientali ex parte ad dandum saisinam et possessionem hereditarem Johanni valandi
burgensis huius burgi de dicta terra cum pertinencijs secundum tenorem carte sue et cetera

Quinto die mensis februarij Anno supradicto gilbertus meignes ex vna et Willelmus
scherar' partibus ex altera summiserunt se Johanni de scrogs patri Alexandro de Kintor
et Johanni gray in actione computi inter eosdem

Item eodem die Alexander de camera penes solucionem grissome debite per eum submisit Ric'
se Ricardo de Ruthirfurd' et Johanni de scrogs patri ad hoc Juratis

Decimo nono die mensis februarij Anno Domini et cetera xliiijto Comparens personaliter in pretorio
huius burgi Willelmus alexandri filius et heres quondam Alexandri Williameson' burgensis huius
burgi resignauit in manibus Johannis de Scrogs filij vnius balliuorum huius burgi
quoddam croftum Jacens in territorio croftorum ex parte orientali de hedownys hill
inter croftum Andree ayncroft ex parte australi ex vna et croftum Stephani
Johnson' ex parte boreali partibus ex altera / ad dandum saisinam et possessionem
hereditariam eidem stephano Johnson' de eodem crofto cum pertinencijs secundum tenorem carte
sue quam inde habet facte de se / Testibus Johanne vaus tunc preposito Johanne
de fife Johanne de Scrogs patre Johanne de marr' Johanne spens seriendo
cum multis et diuersis alijs et cetera

Die nono mensis marcii Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo quadragesimo quarto Comparens personaliter
in pretorio eiusdem burgi frater philippus boyle priour fratrum carmelitarum de Aberdene Resignauit
in manibus Duncani de Clat vnius balliuorum dicti burgi vnam terram Jacentem in futy inter terram
Thome park ex parte boreali ex parte vna et terram Johannis hervy ex parte australi ex parte altera ad
dandum saisinam et possessionem hereditariam Andree benyng' de eadem terra cum pertinenciis Et prefatus
Andreas soluere de annuatim predicto priori et conuentui octo solidos / quam quidam terram prefatus priour recuperauit
per processum legalem hiis testibus Johanne vaus tunc preposito Johanne de Scrogs patre Johanne henrison
culane Dauid de Ruthirfurde et Willelmo scherar' cum multis aliis

Eodem die predictus Duncanus dedit noticiam prefato andree de terra sua s propria Jacente in vico furcarum
ex parte orientali vici eiusdem inter terram alexandri gray ex parte boreali ex parte vna et terram quondam
hered' alexandri fraser' ex parte australi et ex parte altera et coram testibus predictis

xxij die mensis marcij Anno Domini supradicto / Johannes traile filius et heres quondam Dauid
Traile burgensis huius burgi pecijt d cum instancia doceri per balliuos ad terras
sibi Jure hereditario pertinentes / vt moris est in burgis / Et in continens Duncanus de
clat tunc vnius balliuorum huius burgi adiuit secum ad quandam terram Jacentem infra
dictum burgum e in ly buth' raw inter terram Johannis gray ex parte australi et terram
thome blyndseil ex parte boreali / et memorandum quod ista terra est dimidium particate / et inde
soluit annuatim altari beate crucis vj s' viij d' / Et ad quandam terram
Jacentem ex parte occidentali de ly schipraw inter terram Johannis Rede ex parte boreali
et terram henricj sclatar' ex parte australi et docuit eum coram testibus ad easdem
vt moris est et cetera

Secundo die mensis Aprilis Anno Domini et cetera xlv / comparens personaliter Willelmus
filius Alexandri filius et filius et heres quondam Alexandri Williameson' burgensis huius burgi
Resignauit in manibus Johannis de Scrogs filij tunc vnius balliuorum dictj burgi
totum Jus et clameum que habuit habet vel habere poterit / pro se et heredibus
suis aliqualiter in futuris in vel ad terram que fuit quondam Andree giffard'
Jacentem in vico castri int ex parte boreali eiusdem inter terram cristinj pettalochi
ex parte orientali et terram Johannis Watson' ex parte occidentali / vel ad aliquos
annuos Redditus eiusdem in fauorem Roberti blyndseil / que Jus et clameum
predictus balliuus tradidit et dedit eidem Roberto tunc presenti et acceptanti

Sexto die mensis Aprilis Anno Domini supradicto / personaliter comparens in pretorio Johannes
lowson' filius fratris et heres quondam Thome louson' burgensis huius burgi
Resignauit pure et simpliciter per fustem et baculum in manibus thome blyndseil
tunc vnius balliuorum huius burgi totum et integrum illud tenementum suum Jacentem
in vico furcarum ex parte orientali eiusdem inter terram heredum quondam Johannis
bertlotson' ex parte boreali ex vna / et terram heredum quondam patricij lang
ex parte australi partibus ex altera / ad dandum saisinam et possessionem
hereditariam eiusdem s tenementj cum pertinenciis Johanni Wod secundum leges et consuetudines
burgorum Testibus Johanne vaus tunc preposito Alexandro de camera Andrea
de Tulidef Johanne voket Alexandro blyndseil Johanne spens et Johanne
de tulidef duobus seriendorum huius burgi cum multis et diuersis Alijs
EtThere is a manicula in the left margin, with a finger pointing to 'Et'. super hoc pecijt dictus Johannes Wood pecijt instrumentum a me notario publico

Introitus nauis vocate ly christofer quam sub deo gubernat bernardus fras' de Danzik
ludowicus solto, nichalaus stult, x lasta cum dimidio farine barelle / xvj barellas pro lasta
viij lasta bituminis / ij lasta de beir' / ij lasta cinerum
JC Remj / iijxx J bastyntowez
Bernardus freis' dimidium hundreth' eesterland burdis vjC clapholt

James be the grace of god king of Scottis to the Aldirmen ballyhes and Communiteis
of oure borowes of Aberdene and Inuernes greting / for alsmykil as diuers' persounes
Inglismen ar arresit and withhaldin' in the north' partis of oure lande agayne
the natur' of oure trewis be seruitours and men pertenyng to oure derraste
cosing the Erle of Ross' / for the lowsing of the quhilkis Inglismen we haue
writtin to oure said cosing vndir oure priue Seel with' oure seruitoure John'
Scrimgeoure berare of this oure lettres / Oure will is and we pray yhou
effectuosli and alsa chargis / that eyhe assist forthir and supple the said our
seruitoure in lousing of the said persounes Inglismen / as yhe loue the gode of
oure trewis and furthiring of yhoure self in sic like cas' And vndir sic
charge as eftir may folow / And forthir owre in this matir givis credence
to oure said seruitoure in it h at he schawis yhou in oure name / Gevin vndir
oure signet at Striueling the xx dai of marche And of oure Reigne the
Nynt yhere.

head.foreign: Copia littere misse domino Comitj de Ross' per prepositum et consilium huius burgi

div.p:
Right' myghti' and Redoutit lord We commaunde vs on to yhou With' al our' hartez And for
alsmykil as our' souerane lord the king has writtin to yhour lordschip for the deliuerance
of certane Inglismen the quhilke ar in yhour warde and keping as yhe knaw / We counsaile
and beseikis humeli yhour lordschip with' al instance / that for the worschip of the king
and the gude of the Realme yhe witsauf to louse and deliuer frely the said Inglismen
for and yhe sulde noght' deliuer thaim at the kingis instance and charge it war grete
lak and sclaundre to the king of the and the Realme and lessing of yhour worschip
the quhilke god auerte for sen lovid be god hiddirtillis yhe haue al tyme obeit the
king alsweil as ony lord of Scotland and kepit ane hale part til him for the
quhilkis god willand yhe sal sone haue grete loving and Reward / god forbeid that
yhe suld for a litil monee that thir Inglismen has promissit yhou warpis' yhour'
gude name and the Reward and thank that yhe haue deservid and wonnyn of the
king / Right' myghti' and Redoutit lord / almyghti' god conserue yhou euermar'
with' encressing of honour and worschip writtin at abirdene the xiiij dai of Aprile

The last dai of the moneth' of Aprile / the yhere of grace a thousand four' hundreth'
fourty and five / It was concludit statute and ordanit / be the commoune counsaile
and mony othir of the gilde / for lettyng and stancheyng of diuers' enormyteis
done in tyme bigane be the abbotis of this burgh' callit of bone acorde /
that in tyme tocum thai will give na feis to na sic abbotis

Item it is sene speidful to thaim that for this instant yher' thai will haue na sic
abbot / bot thai will that the Aldirman for the tyme and a balyhe quhom that
he will tak til him / supple that faute

Item thai haue chosin thomas of Kintor Walter giffart John' blak and Dauid symson'
to be serchearis for this yher' of the barell' of salmond' of this ton' / and thai
sal haue a seel made tharfor to seel the barell' that thai fynd sufficient
And thai ar sworn the grete ath' to be lele and trew to that office / And
thai sal Seel na barell' / bot thai be of sufficient moyson' / and ful rede and
swete / And thai sal haue to thair' fee for sercheying of ilke last vj d'

Item it is sene speidful to the Counsaile to trete give thai may get the
fredome to be schirrefis within the ton' and to mak a coste tharapon
